description:
Coal had America by the stones - then came fracking. Check out the entire The Secret Life of Natural Gas for ... I don't want to say the WHOLE story, but it's a lot: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K2oL4SFwkkw

America's gas addiction is only expanding. For more on the problems with the natural gas bonanza, check out our friends over at HotandToxic.org for more, and take a look at their all new series over on their YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@UCc5Nau0Kr7O8ES2oaj9L6bQ
title: DON'T YOU GO NEAR MY COAL!
